name: burnIn
comment: # number of burn in time steps

name: ioSteps
comment: #number of steps after when the IO writen to file

name: burnInTimeFactor
comment: # time factor that increases time speed in

name: omniscientBurnIn
comment: # number of omiscient agent time steps

name: mobNewPeriod
comment: # period within a choice is new and not challenged

name: randomCarPropDeviationSTD
comment: # individual random deviation of car properities

name: selfTrust
comment: # how much more a agent values this own opinion

name: radicality
comment: # exponent of the preferences -> high values lead to extreme differences

name: connRadius
comment: # radius within which location cell get connected

name: minFriends
comment: # min number of friends per person

name: maxFriends
comment: # max number of friends per person

name: weightConnections
comment: # flag if connections to friends are weighted
